gcci.text: H100 pricing at $3.34/hr is stabilizing as capacity expansions and improved US-East supply reduce chip scarcity, easing capex concerns for new deployments.

gtpi.text: DeepSeek's $1.31/1M token input pricing reflects intensified API price wars, driving rapid model distillation and efficiency gains.

gagl.text: Kimi reports a 160 TWh annual load, highlighting grid strain that pushes utilities toward nuclear baseload and carbon‑neutral strategies.

aipi.text: GLM sees market sentiment turning cautious amid bubble warnings, with growth now reliant on sustainable AI infrastructure investments.
